data.name: Hidden Shapes Lovely Cats - Jigsaw Puzzle Game Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Includes all the original songs from HIDDEN SHAPES – LOVELY CATS, specially composed for the game by Caue Lemes, member of the band DONGO DONGO, in 320 kbps MP3 format.

Now you can enjoy the songs from the game “Hidden Shapes – Lovely Cats” on your computer at any time.

Perfect for studying, working or just relaxing. Listen directly from your Steam client.

The songs can be directly accessed through the Steam platform or by following the steps below:
... or in the Hidden Shapes Lovely Cats - Jigsaw Puzzle Game Soundtrack folder in the Steam directory: ... \ Steam \ steamapps \ music \ Hidden Shapes Lovely Cats - Jigsaw Puzzle Game Soundtrack.
